name: Jurassic World Evolution
description: Place yourself at the heart of the Jurassic franchise and build your own Jurassic World. Bioengineer dinosaurs that think, feel and react intelligently to the world around them and face threats posed by espionage, breakouts and devastating tropical storms in an uncertain world where life always finds a way.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit Processor: Intel i5-2300/AMD FX-4300 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Legacy GPU: GeForce GTX 660) / AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) / 8.1/10 64bit Processor: Intel i7-4770/AMD FX-8350 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 12 GB available space
